plot: A woman, feeling trapped in a relationship with a self-absorbed photographer, reevaluates her future while encountering unexplainable visions of his deceased ex-wife.
title: For Who I Am
plot_es: A woman, feeling trapped in a relationship with a self-absorbed photographer, reevaluates her future while encountering unexplainable visions of his deceased ex-wife.
plot_en: A woman, feeling trapped in a relationship with a self-absorbed photographer, reevaluates her future while encountering unexplainable visions of his deceased ex-wife.
